name: Spatium (Tednesday)
description:
Submission for the 4mb Game Jam.

Jetpack around a physically simulated solar system with little voxel planets to explore! Find all of the glowing spheres.

As you fly you are effected by gravity. Try not to fall into the sun.

Controls:

  • ESCAPE - Toggles mouse lock.
  • W, S - Thruster forward  and backward (toward where you look).
  • A, D - Thruster in a strafe like manner
  • SPACE, LCONTROL - Thrust up and down.
  • Q, E - When in free space this will rotate you.
  • LMB - Takes a picture.

Cheats:

  • P - Toggles Edit mode.
  • L - Increase velocity of all planets.
  • O - Increase gravity.
  • F1 - Show normals
  • F2 - Show triangles
  • F3 - Show grey.

Edit Mode:

  • LMB, RMB - Add and take voxels.
  • NUM1, NUM2 - Decrease/Increase radius of voxel selection.

Known Bugs:

  • Z fighting issues
  • Definitely collision problems, see if you can find them.
